original_text: It is difficult to go through the small gate. And it is difficult to walk on the narrow road. But when you do go that way, you will get true life. Not many people find that narrow gate.’
korean_text: 생명으로 인도하는 문은 좁고 길이 협착하여 찾는 자가 적음이라

sentences.original_text: It is difficult to go through the small gate.
And it is difficult to walk on the narrow road.
But when you do go that way,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신이 그 길로 갈 때,

sentences.original_text: Not many people find that narrow gate.'
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 그 좁은 문을 찾지 못합니다.'
